casebody.data:
DEWARD & RICH, Inc., and Amsterdam Syndicate, Inc., Appellants, v. C. H. BRIDGES, d/b/a Bridges Shoe Store, Appellee. No. 12221. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit Dec. 7, 1948. M. M. Wade and E. Hastings Ackley, both of Dallas, Tex., for appellant. Mark E. Kramer, of Dallas, Tex., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, WALLER, and LEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
